record.title: RECESS

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in recess for 2 minutes to greet these fine Parliamentarians.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 4:45 p.m., recessed until 4:47 p.m., and reassembled when called to order by the Presiding Officer (Ms. KLOBUCHAR).
